job_history.work_description: Ensure accuracy and completeness of all payments, recovery and related financial dossiers at both the incoming and outgoing stage. Processing payment dossiers for efficient implementation of EDF Projects. Liaise with the European Commission Delegation (ECD) Projects and partners on all matters relating to the financial aspects of EDF resources including payments, recoveries and procedures.

Provided assistance and support on EDF Contractual, Procurement and Financial Management. Assisted with the preparation of tender documents and launching of tenders. Assisted with updating the provider database with all the rules and regulations applicable to the management of EDF.
Reviewed pay slips for accuracy. Prepared stock stack cards. Responsible for Inventory and Stock control. Assisted in Procurement procedures. Prepared and reviewed payment vouchers.

education.domain: Finance, Marketing, Operations Management, Economics and Business Law

education.university: Institute of Public Administration & Management (IPAM) University of Sierra Leone

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial management, including processing payment dossiers, ensuring accuracy and completeness of payments, and liaising with partners on financial aspects of EDF resources.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Assisted with procurement procedures and preparation of tender documents, showing a solid working proficiency in procurement.

skills.name: Inventory Control
skills.explanation: Responsible for inventory and stock control as an intern, indicating some practical experience in inventory control.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Involved in financial reporting through payment dossiers and financial management, showing a solid working proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Grants
skills.explanation: Mentioned as an interest, but no direct experience or involvement in grants management is evident in the provided job history or education.
